You need more than 1.6 grams of beta alanine alone, so this pre-workout is definitely underdosed. Your gains deserve so much better. What's even worse is supplement companies that have been getting away with this for years, so Alpha Lion set out on a mission to change that. After years of research, we launched superhuman pre-workouts to the world and it took off like wildfire, quickly becoming the most hyped up pre-workout of 2022. Experience the perfect balance of energizing ingredients, allowing you to power through every training session with unwavering intensity. Unlock your full potential—fuel your performance with Transparent Labs Pre-Workout. Clean energy. Pure focus. Unmatched results.

preferred_output.content: Hey Sarasota, does your smile ever hold you back? Do you ever feel self-conscious when you're looking at yourself in the mirror or taking photos? Well, you are not alone. Many of our patients feel the same way about their misaligned teeth. Hi, I'm Dr. Olga Dantova with over 27 years of experience and here at Modern Smile Design we transform thousands of smiles and we came up with the solution. It's called Invisalign. Invisalign aligners are clear and nearly invisible. They gently move your teeth into the perfect position. Each aligner you wear is not just about moving your teeth, it's about moving towards that smile that gives you real self-confidence. We are happy to announce our Invisalign Summer Special at Modern Smile Design. For the summer special, you get additional $2,400 off your Invisalign treatment. On the top of it, you get a complimentary consultation with me and also you get a toothbrush at the end of the treatment and a whitening kit which is complimentary and will make your smile shine brighter. We're one out of six certified digital smile design clinic in Florida which help us to show your outcome for the treatment prior to the treatment. So don't wait to feel your best this summer. This offer is for the first 10 patients this month. If you're ready to change your smile, boost that confidence, and be summer ready, click the Learn More button below and schedule your consultation with us.

[Transcript:]

A confident smile can transform the way you see yourself. Our customized aligners work gently to enhance your smile while allowing you to maintain your daily routine without interruption. Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Ice Blanket. Product description:  a thick

preferred_output.content: If you're a hot sleeper like me, then you've probably gone to the store and bought one of these cheap cooling blankets. The only problem is that they're thin like a bed sheet, so you don't get that comfort you would get from a traditional duvet. They're not machine washable, they're made with cheap fabrics, and they don't really work. That's why I decided to do something about it, and I invented the ice blanket. It took me over a year of research and a hundred different samples to create this blanket, but this thing is the coldest blanket on the market. Not only is it moisture wicking and machine washable, but it's temperature regulating. So what that means is that when you go to sleep at night, it's going to cool you down to the optimal temperature to fall asleep faster, but then it's going to absorb your body heat throughout the night, and it's designed to be thick enough to feel like a duvet, but still keep you cool all night long. I only have a couple hundred left, so make sure to grab them because the last time I dropped these, they sold out in like three days.

non_preferred_output.content:
Certainly! Here is a formal ad copy for Ice Blanket, based on your brief product description as “a thick” (presuming you meant a thick ice blanket):

---

**Experience the Power of Lasting Cool with Ice Blanket**

Introducing Ice Blanket—the ultimate solution for maintaining exceptional cold wherever you need it most. Engineered with a thick, durable design, Ice Blanket delivers superior insulation, ensuring long-lasting cooling for your perishables, beverages, or medical supplies. 

Whether you are planning a family picnic, transporting groceries, or preserving essential items, trust Ice Blanket to provide unmatched protection against heat. Invest in peace of mind and performance with Ice Blanket—where exceptional thickness meets outstanding reliability.

Stay cool. Stay fresh. Choose Ice Blanket.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.

Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for V34. Product description:  an instant color-correcting tooth serum that reduces the yellow appearance of teeth and provides a whitening effect without causing sensitivity.

preferred_output.content: Okay, so you apply it like this. Let's ensure full coverage to the tooth. And bam! Look at that. You can see the immediate color correction working on the surface of the tooth. Come have a look. And watch. Even as we wipe it completely off the surface of the tooth, you can see the result clearly staying put to leave that brightening effect to teeth. That's powerful V34 color correction technology at work. Let me explain V34 in 30 seconds. Imagine that this yellow balloon is a yellow stain. If I use the color purple, I can cancel out the yellow stain. Bleaching or whitening teeth is fundamentally about reducing the yellow tones of your teeth. Color correction achieves a similar, very desirable effect because it also reduces the yellow appearance of teeth, but it does so instantly. With color correcting, the result is entirely on the surface. Nothing is penetrating in, so it is entirely painless and causes zero sensitivity. So effectively, you are getting a painless and effective solution for yellow teeth. The proprietary blend of dyes that V34 uses effectively erases the appearance of yellow, so it's something that you can paint on and instantly the appearance of teeth looks very much whiter.

non_preferred_output.content: Introducing V34—an advanced, instant color-correcting tooth serum designed to enhance your smile. Formulated to visibly reduce the yellow appearance of teeth, V34 delivers a whitening effect without causing sensitivity or discomfort. Experience a radiant, brighter smile from the very first use, and enjoy the confidence of teeth that look naturally luminous. Reveal your best smile with V34: instant results, zero sensitivity.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Broya. Product description:  high-quality bone broth made from locally sourced meats and bones

preferred_output.content: What's up guys, I'm Tim, I'm the founder of Broya, and I'm going to tell you a little bit about why I decided to start this brand. Years before I started Broya, I actually started sourcing high quality meats from local farmers about an hour outside of the city. You source directly from the farmer, you're getting everything. You're getting the muscle meats, the steaks, the organs, and the bones. I'm not going to lie, I had no idea what to do with these bones, so they just sat in the bottom of my freezer. Then I started doing a bit of research on bone broth, and I started to see that actually one of the best ways to get collagen protein is from bone broth. So I just started making it every single day. I started drinking about two cups every single day, and it was pretty clear to me right away that this was a game changer. Within a couple weeks, I noticed some immediate improvements to my gut health. And that's when Broya was born. Boom! Man, the world needs to know about this. And there was no bone broth being sold in the grocery stores, at least no high quality ones.

non_preferred_output.content: Introducing Broya — premium bone broth crafted from locally sourced meats and bones. Experience unmatched quality in every sip, as Broya delivers wholesome nutrition and rich, savory flavor to your daily routine. Slow-simmered for hours, our broth is packed with natural collagen, minerals, and protein, supporting your wellbeing from the inside out. Enjoy it as a nourishing beverage or a flavorful foundation for your favorite recipes. Choose Broya: locally sourced, expertly crafted, naturally delicious.
